title: Plate VI from "Nella Venuta in Roma di Madama LeComte e dei Signori Watelet e Copette"
marks:
Inscription, stamp

URC, in the plate: [18.]; be
description: one seated man writing, one standing man and one standing woman, LRC; large cloud (of smoke?) at center; a putti with a bird hide under cloud at center; figure with draping garment, holding a garland, at R
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
